name: MMS - Manual Mail Sorting
description:
CONTROLS
Grab letters with Left Mouse Button from the Letter Pile and drag em around!

This is probably my first game. I've learned code through random tutorials and got help from my friends and the godot community, but i've honestly learned a lot.

The game in it's current state lacks the start and game over screen, there is no score, goal etc. It's very unfinished but i plan on finishing it in the coming days!

The way i play it is: i still just sort letters where they should go, and thats it :3

.....listen, it was hard to make ok.

Known bugs:

When you pass over the letter pile and press left mouse button a letter will spawn at the position of the mouse
